name: Carbquik Cheddar Buns
ingredients: 2 tablespoons parmesan cheese (the kind in a can)
Cooking spray or butter for greasing

instructions.en: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease 6 cups of a muffin top pan.
instructions.sk: Predhrejte rúru na 175°C. Vymastite 6 jamiek formy na muffiny.
instructions.ja: オーブンを350°F（175°C）に予熱します。マフィントップパンの6つのカップに油を塗ります。

instructions.en: In a medium bowl, whisk together the softened cream cheese and eggs until smooth.
instructions.sk: V stredne veľkej miske vyšľahajte zmäknutý krémový syr a vajcia do hladka.
instructions.ja: 中サイズのボウルで、柔らかくしたクリームチーズと卵をなめらかになるまで泡立て器で混ぜます。

instructions.en: Whisk in the parmesan cheese, Splenda, garlic powder, onion powder, Carbquik, and baking powder until a smooth batter forms.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte parmezán, Splendu, cesnakový prášok, cibuľový prášok, Carbquik a prášok do pečiva, kým nevznikne hladké cesto.
instructions.ja: パルメザンチーズ、スプレンダ、ガーリックパウダー、オニオンパウダー、Carbquik、ベーキングパウダーを加え、滑らかな生地になるまで泡立て器で混ぜます。

instructions.en: Stir in the shredded cheddar cheese with a spoon.
instructions.ja: シュレッドしたチェダーチーズをスプーンで混ぜ込みます。

instructions.en: Spoon the batter into the 6 greased muffin top pan cups.
instructions.sk: Nalejte cesto do 6 vymastených jamiek formy na muffiny.
instructions.ja: 生地を6つの油を塗ったマフィントップパンのカップに注ぎます。

instructions.en: Bake for 15-17 minutes, or until golden brown and not too dark on the bottoms.
instructions.sk: Pečte 15-17 minút, alebo kým nezhnednú a nie sú príliš tmavé na spodku.
instructions.ja: 15〜17分間、または上面がきつね色になり、底面が濃すぎない程度に焼きます。

instructions.en: Remove from the pan and cool completely on a rack.
instructions.sk: Vyberte z formy a nechajte úplne vychladnúť na mriežke.
instructions.ja: パンから取り出し、ラックの上で完全に冷まします。

notes: These Carbquik Cheddar Buns are a low-carb alternative to traditional cheese buns. They're best made in a muffin top pan for the ideal shape and texture. Carbquik is a low-carb baking mix that helps keep these buns keto-friendly. The combination of cheddar and parmesan cheeses gives these buns a rich, savory flavor.
